import { Outlet, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../store/auth'; function Layout() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; return (
Resource Management
Dashboard {isManager() ? ( <> Projects Engineers Assignments ) : ( <> My Assignments Profile )}
{user?.name}
); } export default Layout;
